alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 5:03AM EDT until April 13 at 7:24AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Saluda River At Chappells affecting Saluda, Greenwood and Newberry Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Marlboro and Chesterfield Counties. North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. At 119.0 feet, Extensive flooding occurs in the Congaree National Park. Some area farmland is flooded. Minor flooding occurs at the Carolina Eastman Facility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:20 AM EDT Monday the stage was 119.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 120.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
